item.title: Madeye's Castle TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Madeye’s Castle TryHackMe Writeup This room made me learn many things through the process, including sql injection , vulnerability in rand() function and also regex !. I highly recommend doing SQL Injection Lab before doing this as it starts from basics and explains very well . It has some very good challenges which will be useful in any rooms involving sqli. First Stage : Enumeration So let’s start with nmap

item.title: Delivery HackTheBox Writeup
item.description: Delivery HackTheBox Writeup This was a very interesting and a different box . First Stage : Enumeration Hence as usual we fire up nmap. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Sun Jan 31 19:38:00 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.10.10.222 Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.222 Host is up, received syn-ack (0.24s latency). Scanned at 2021-01-31 19:38:02 IST for 1456s Not shown: 65532 closed ports Reason: 65532 conn-refused PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 22/tcp open ssh syn-ack OpenSSH 7.

item.title: Cyborg TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Cyborg TryHackMe Writeup So this was a very different box from others and also an interesting concept is used on initial foothold. Nmap scan report for 10.10.143.35 Host is up, received syn-ack (0.

Scanned at 2020-12-11 11:56:08 IST for 362s Not shown: 65534 filtered ports Reason: 65534 no-responses PORT STATE SERVICE REASON 5003/tcp open filemaker syn-ack Read data files from: /usr/bin/.

item.title: All in One TryHackMe Writeup
ColddBox TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: ColddBox TryHackme Walkthrough First Stage : Enumeration Nmap Scan shows port 80 and 4512 open. Now lets visit the site on port 80. Also we can see a comment in the post. Since the website is wordpress website we should use wpscan to enumerate. wpscan –url http://<ip> So the wordpress theme is twentyfifteen. Lets see if we can enumerate some usernames with wpscan wpscan –url http://<ip> -e u

item.title: About d4rkn1gh7
item.description: Welcome to my technical blog My name is Balaji Anandhan Hacking and Coding are my passion . I play ctfs in Hackthebox and TryHackMe and also code in my free time. I am still learning and I will keep learning.I share my knowledge in this blog. Try Harder Privacy is a Myth My accounts TryHackMe : glitched01 HackTheBox : glitched01 GitHub : d4rkn1gh7 Instagram : Balaji_6120
